events.name: GINNI ICO - Learn How Mining and Bitcoin ATM can be rewarding!
events.description: Widely acclaimed by media Vikas Gupta , CEO of minersatwork.com a Singapore start-up in blockchain technology will be sharing about GINNI and drilling down how mining in singapore + disruptive atms can be a viable business model. We invite who are interested to know more about this tech-evolution and would like to form a group of like-minded individuals and explore , discuss and clarify their doubts further. Q&A's can be fielded to the team regarding any doubts one may have.
events.location: Lowercase Cafe (at Lasalle College of the Arts), Blk D, 01-01, 1 MacNally Street, Singapore

events.name: Robotics Lab 2018
events.description:
Leave a Nest's Robotics Lab is commencing on 21st January 2018! Come join us to learn some basic engineering skills and build different robots during each session. Participants of our trail sessions in Oct and Nov 2017 really enjoyed making their hovercrafts, and we look forward to seeing other interesting creations and designs from our future participants ~
Trial Workshop Report
If you sign up for the entire year, we would extend the dicounted price of $720 for 12 sessions (11 robots leading up to the final session for presentation and a certificate of attendance). Alternatively you could sign up for individual sessions which cost $70 each.Â 
Registration Link
Please see flyer for more details:
events.location: 19 Tai Seng Ave, 19 Tai Seng Avenue, Level 5, XPC, Singapore 534054
